description_en: Smart venue for Tafelspitz boiled beef & other classics of Viennese cuisine, with outdoor seating.
18th-century summer palace with tours of lavish rococo ceremonial rooms, plus gardens with a maze.
Deep, narrow gorge with footpaths, bridges, river & waterfall, only open in the summer months.
Elegant quarters in a ornate hotel with 2 refined restaurants, a terrace bar & a full-service spa.
Huge Roman amphitheater with an underground exhibition about ancient olive oil & wine production.
